alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 17 at 3:17AM EDT until July 18 at 6:48AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Warner River At Davisville affecting Merrimack County. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Maine...New Hampshire... Saco River At Conway affecting Oxford, Carroll and Cumberland Counties. Swift River At Roxbury affecting Oxford County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Floodwaters surround homes and roads in the Riverside Park Drive community off Pinewood Road in Allenstown. Water up to Jasper Drive, Bourge Roads, and Albin Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 AM EDT Monday was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 4.6 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
